## R Markdown
### Three hashes = Subheading
#### Four hashes = Subsubheading

If I want *italics*, I use one star around the text.

If I want **bold**, I use two stars around the text.

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(spotifyr)
spotifyr::get_spotify_access_token()
```

```{r}
eighties<- get_playlist_audio_features("", "23xQYspGsaIsztrKTHM8cN")
nineties <- get_playlist_audio_features("", "0MmrdphoTkHhChZR5ympER")

two_decades <-
  bind_rows(
    eighties %>% mutate(decade = "80s"),
    nineties %>% mutate(decade = "90s")
  )
```
